Name: Puzzle 3D
About the game: The goal of jigsaw puzzle is to restore the original jigsaw puzzles, This is a 3D puzzle, so you will encounter the challenges you haven't met in 2D plane puzzle! Each scene will have three levels. Rotate, pan, push and pull puzzles as well The distance of the game's sight, rotation, and pan around are controlled by the mouse, The left top corner of the game there will be a simple prompt.
Meta Title: Puzzle 3D: Mar 1, 2018, Jake Peng and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Puzzle 3D? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2018), developer insights from Jake Peng, and a complete game summary.
